theAdventurer:StoutPower_TA.NAME: Stout
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal +5 damage and gain +5 block. Stout is reduced by 1 each turn.

theAdventurer:SatiatedPower_TA.NAME: Satiated
DESCRIPTIONS: Removed at the start of your turn.

theAdventurer:SautéPower_TA.NAME: Sauté
DESCRIPTIONS: damage at the end of your turn. Can be blocked. Decays by half each turn rounded down.

theAdventurer:GoredPower_TA.NAME: Gored
DESCRIPTIONS: damage when you play a card.

theAdventurer:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
